attributes.action: require  the Rugby Football Union to change it's name  and it's constutution should this be necessary to achieve this aim , to the English Rugby Union thereby bringing it in line with the rest of the rugby world whose nationality is identified in their name.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have looked on the world wide web , entering countries at random , and have yet to find a single country whose organising body does not include its nationality - I can see no clear excuse  for the RFU not to change its  name to the ERU - English Rugby Union.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
